title: Annual Science Fair 2026
description:
Join us for our Annual Science Fair where students showcase their innovative projects and experiments!

  • Interactive demonstrations
  • Student presentations
  • Awards ceremony

title: Spring Sports Day
description:
Get ready for an exciting day of athletic competitions and team spirit!

All students and families are invited to participate and cheer on our athletes.

title: Parent-Teacher Conference Week
description:
Important: Parent-Teacher conferences will be held throughout the week.

Please schedule your appointment through the school office.
